SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller

Class Lobby

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller.Lobby
public class Lobby extends Object
This class represents the lobby of the game. It is used to manage the players that are waiting to play. It is also used to load and save games.

  • Constructor Details

    • Lobby

      public Lobby(@NotNull @NotNull String savesDirectory, String goalsDirectory)
      Create a lobby
      Parameters:
      savesDirectory - directory where game are saved
      goalsDirectory - where the goals are loaded from

  • Method Details

    • join

      public Optional<String> join() throws WaitLobbyException
      Taste join of a player
      Returns:
      an Optional containing a unique id to the first player to connect, else an empty Optional and addPlayer can be called
      Throws:
      WaitLobbyException - if the there is already a first player and the game is in creation

    • getIsCreating

      public boolean getIsCreating()
      Get if first player is creating the game
      Returns:
      true if first player is creating the game

    • isGameLoaded

      public boolean isGameLoaded()
      Check if game has been loaded
      Returns:
      true if game created has been loaded from a save

    • getSavedGames

      public Set<String> getSavedGames()
      Get all saves
      Returns:
      a Set of the saved games names

    • getLoadedPlayersNames

      public List<String> getLoadedPlayersNames()
      Get the players' names from the loaded game
      Returns:
      list of names

    • joinFirstPlayer

      public boolean joinFirstPlayer(String name, int numPlayersGame, boolean easyRules, String id)
      First player join and creates a new game
      Parameters:
      name - future nickname in the game
      numPlayersGame - players in the game. From 2 to 4
      easyRules - set true for easy rule game mode
      id - first player's id
      Returns:
      true if game creation went well

    • loadGame

      public List<String> loadGame(String name, String idFirstPlayer) throws GameLoadException, GameNameException, IllegalLobbyException
      Load saved game
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the saved game
      idFirstPlayer - the id of the first player to connect
      Returns:
      the list of loaded game players nicknames
      Throws:
      GameNameException - game name not available
      GameLoadException - could not load the game
      IllegalLobbyException - this player can not perform this action

    • joinLoadedGameFirstPlayer

      public boolean joinLoadedGameFirstPlayer(String name, String id) throws NicknameException
      First player join a game previously loaded
      Parameters:
      name - future nickname in the game from those available
      id - first player's id
      Returns:
      true if game creation went well
      Throws:
      NicknameException - nickname not available in the old nicknames list

    • addPlayer

      public String addPlayer(@NotNull @NotNull String player) throws FullGameException, NicknameTakenException, NicknameException, FirstPlayerAbsentException
      Add a player to the lobby
      Parameters:
      player - player name
      Returns:
      id of the player that joined
      Throws:
      FullGameException - game is full / game is being played
      NicknameTakenException - this name was taken from another player
      NicknameException - if the game is loaded and the player do not take one of the available ones
      FirstPlayerAbsentException - if there is not a first player yet

    • removePlayer

      public boolean removePlayer(String playerId)
      Remove a player from the lobby. If first player is removed while them are creating the game than the lobby is reset
      Parameters:
      playerId - player's id
      Returns:
      true if remove was successful, false if it wasn't or player didn't exist

    • isFistPlayerPresent

      public boolean isFistPlayerPresent()
      Check if first player is present
      Returns:
      true if first player is present

    • isReadyToPlay

      private boolean isReadyToPlay()
      Return if the lobby could start
      Returns:
      true if the lobby is full

    • startGame

      public ControllerProvider startGame() throws EmptyLobbyException, ArrestGameException
      Start a game
      Returns:
      ControllerProvider to manage the game
      Throws:
      EmptyLobbyException - lobby is not full
      ArrestGameException - something went wrong in the model

    • isPlaying

      public boolean isPlaying()
      Ask if the game started
      Returns:
      true if game is being played

    • getControllerProvider

      public ControllerProvider getControllerProvider()
      get current controller provider
      Returns:
      controller provider | null if not present

    • getIdFromName

      public String getIdFromName(String name)
      Get player's id from player's name
      Parameters:
      name - player's name
      Returns:
      player's id . Returns null if there is not such player

    • getNameFromId

      public String getNameFromId(String id)
      Get player's name from player's id
      Parameters:
      id - player's id
      Returns:
      player's name . Returns null if there is not such player

    • forceReset

      private void forceReset()
      Force a reset of the lobby also when the game is not ended

    • reset

      public void reset()
      Reset game and lobby. Note MUST CALL when game is ended
